```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
library("arulesViz")
```

Load Data
```{r}
load("Data/df_category.RData")
```

Inspect Data
```{r}
#filter out eucast data
ECOFF_mined <- df_category %>% 
  filter(str_detect(.[, 1], "eu")) %>% 
  mutate(set_item_factors = as.factor(.$all.sets.items))

CLSI_mined <- df_category %>% 
  filter(str_detect(.[, 1], "clsi")) %>% 
  mutate(set_item_factors = as.factor(.$all.sets.items))


```
